summary: A hit man traumatized from accidentally killing a young girl during a job is given the mission to eliminate her mother, and begins the ultimate fight to save her life.
cast: Jang Dong-Gun|Min-hee Kim|Brian Tee|Hee-won Kim|Jun Kim|Jeon Bae-soo|Kim Min-jae|Lee Young-Ian|Anthony Dilio|Alexander Wraith|Rich Ting|Angela Bullock|Ji-Woo Kang|Go Woo Rim|So-jin Kim|Ji Seong Kim|Yo-Han Byun|Lee Moon-ho|Min Sung-wuk|Kim Geu-rim|Seung-chan Lee|Hyo-min Kim|Ok-joo Yoo|Kyeong-hee Kim|Han-na Kang|Sang-kyeong Hwang|Je-Heon Choi|Geon-woo Ji|Jae-hwan Shin|Hyeong-won|Sung-il Shin|Yeon-woo Nam|Sang-hun Park|Jang In-sub|Hyeon Woo Seo|Lee Kyeong-Heon|Ahn Jeong-mo|Park Ji-Yeon|Choi Seung-il|Hyeon-woo Kang|Tae-hoon Kim|Gyoo-Hyeon Lee|Son Cheol-Min|Young Ho Joo|Yoon Dong-Yeong|Kim Moon-hak|Dong-hwi Lee|Kim Wan-soo|Jeong Seong Woo|Jeon Byeong-gi|Jae-in Lee|Moon Soo-ah|Jeong Soo-Jeong|Kim Na-hee|Seong-oh Kim|Hyeon-ik Baek|Matthew Douma|Edward Bosco|Jennifer Buttell|Skoti Collins|Alessandro Cuomo|Darell M.
